declare @p char(6), @r nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000) declare @s nvarchar(128), @l int, @size int, @i int, @vc char(3), @ext varchar(3), @delta int select top 0 identity(int, 1, 1) as id, stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, cast('' as char(6)) as p into #tagRow from &FlowMultiGeneralTable; select @size = 0 select @i = 1, @l = datalength(text) from @k select @size = charindex(',', text, @size) from @k
while @size > 0 and @size < @l begin select @s = replace(substring(text, @i, @size - @i), '''', '') from @k select @vc = right(left(@s, charindex(char(255), @s) - 1), 3) insert into #tagRow(stt_rec, stt_rec0) select left(@s, charindex(char(255), @s) - 1), right(@s, (len(@s) - charindex(char(255), @s))) select @i = @size + 1, @delta = charindex(',', substring(text, @size + 1, @l - @size)) from @k if @delta = 0 break
select @size = @size + @delta end if @i < @l begin select @s = replace(substring(text, @i, @l - @i), '''', '') from @k select @vc = right(left(@s, charindex(char(255), @s) - 1), 3) insert into #tagRow(stt_rec, stt_rec0) select left(@s, charindex(char(255), @s) - 1), right(@s, (len(@s) - charindex(char(255), @s))) end
select @ext = case when @vc = 'PNA' then '71' when @vc = 'PNB' then '72' else '78' end set @r = 'update #tagRow set p = convert(char(6), b.ngay_ct, 112) from #tagRow a join c' + @ext + '$000000 b on b.stt_rec = a.stt_rec' exec sp_executesql @r
select top 0 tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri) as ma_vi_tri, 0 as vi_tri_yn, rtrim(a.ma_lo) as ma_lo, b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, rtrim(a.ma_kho) as ma_kho, rtrim(a.dvt) as dvt, a.ngay_ct, a.tk_vt &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; into #d from #tagRow tr cross join d71$000000 a cross join dmvt b
set @r = ' insert into #d select tr.id, b.nhieu_dvt, a.he_so, rtrim(a.ma_vi_tri), case when exists(select top 1 ma_kho from dmvitri z where z.ma_kho = a.ma_kho) then 1 else 0 end, rtrim(a.ma_lo), b.lo_yn, b.sua_tk_vt, rtrim(a.ma_vt), rtrim(a.ma_kho), rtrim(a.dvt), a.ngay_ct, ' + case when @vc <> 'PNG' and not exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_compact_mode' and val = 1) then 'isnull(rtrim(c.tk_vt), rtrim(a.tk_vt))' else 'rtrim(a.tk_vt)' end + ' &FlowMultiUserDefinedFieldsQuery; from (select id, stt_rec, stt_rec0 from #tagRow where p = ''%Partition'') tr join d' + @ext + '$%Partition a on tr.stt_rec = a.stt_rec and tr.stt_rec0 = a.stt_rec0 left join dmvt b on a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt ' + case when @vc <> 'PNG' and not exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_compact_mode' and val = 1) then ' left join d74$%Partition c on a.stt_rec_ir = c.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0ir = c.stt_rec0' else '' end
select distinct p into #p from #tagRow select @p = min(p) from #p while @p is not null begin set @q = replace(@r, '%Partition', @p) exec sp_executesql @q select @p = min(p) from #p where p > @p end
select '' as array$, id, &OtherCopyField; from #d &FlowMultiOrderBy; return
